testcase.classname: Connection To CZ by Select Approval status menu
testcase.name: Select ROLE_PAPERLESS to enable Menu Approval Status (MANDATORY)
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Role Management"...........................................passed And Choose Dropdown Username "mobile.test"..................................passed And Select Role "ROLE_PAPERLESS"............................................passed And Click button "Change"...................................................passed And Get text from pop up "Confirm" with text "Are you sure?"................passed And Click button "Yes"......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: Connection To CZ by Select Approval status menu
testcase.name: Select Menu Approval status then Click send Email
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Approval Status"...........................................passed
